isCulled

public boolean isCulled(Camera pCamera)
Description copied from interface: IEntity
Will only be performed if IEntity.isCullingEnabled() is true.

Specified by:
isCulled in interface IEntity
Overrides:
isCulled in class Entity
Parameters:
pCamera - the currently active camera to perform culling checks against.
Returns:
true when this object is visible by the Camera, false otherwise.
